body:
Hi Thomas,


Very nice tool and easy to use! I think Radiance users in windows will be
very happy with this tool!


Just one thing to check.
When I start program before main window is opened, I got an error:
"The procedure entry point EtwTraceMessage couldnt no be located in the
dynamic link library ntdll.dll"


When I close error message, program is opened it seems that all features are
working without problems.


I'm using Windows XP Professional.


Thanks again for such a useful tool,
Marija
___
